# R Code

## R Code
Here is some **R** code

\scriptsize
```{r, eval = FALSE}
# Load data
data(ggplot2::txhousing)

# Compare monthly home sales in Austin, TX (2006, 2009)
tx_bubble <- txhousing %>% 
  group_by(month, year) %>% 
  filter(city == "Austin") %>% 
  filter(year == "2006" | year == "2009") %>% 
  summarize(sales = sum(sales))
```

# Equations

## Equations
- Calculate sample variance ($s^2$)

\begin{equation}
{s}^{2}=\frac{{\Sigma(X-\bar{X})}^{2}}{N-1} 
\label{eq:variance}
\end{equation}
